lead_paragraph: Mr. Rattner, who led the Obama administration’s auto industry overhaul, was barred from certain Wall Street jobs in 2010.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; S.E.C. Allows Financier to Join Guggenheim Partners
headline.main: S.E.C. Opens Door to Investment Banking for Steven Rattner, Barred Financier

snippet: Mr. Rattner, who led the Obama administration’s auto industry overhaul, was barred from certain Wall Street jobs in 2010.
abstract: Securities and Exchange Commission says financier Steven Rattner may join investment banking division of Guggenheim Partners; he had been barred from certain Wall Street jobs in 2010 after settling charges relating to kickbacks investigation.
